item.title: Context and Content
item.description: In the bustling world of digital media, the term content is ubiquitous. From blogs and videos to social media posts and podcasts, content creation is the lifeblood of the internet. While content creation is about generating material, context creation involves crafting the setting and conditions that allow the content to be meaningful and impactful.
